name: Virtual Warfighter
description: Virtual Warfighter is a tactical multiplayer shooter for the OpenVR virtual reality platform. Engage in realistic combat with physics-based weapons and handling!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
